entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Remove dotnet7 feeds from NuGet.config when dependencies publish into dotnet8 feeds #63375
  • Deadlock on stack overflow #63370
    7.0.0
  • Error Publishing Blazor WebAssembly app using AOT Compilation #63360
  • System.Numerics.Vector3 causes a segfault #63354
  • [API Proposal]: Activity.IsStopped (functionality required to conform to OpenTelemetry specification) #63353
    7.0.0
  • NullReferenceException when closing HttpListener #63345
    Future
  • [wasm] Drop support for CommonJS and WasmEnableES6 #63337
    7.0.0
  • Additional cross-platform hardware intrinsic APIs for loading/storing, reordering, and extracting a per-element "mask" #63331
  • `Process.Kill(entireProcessTree: true)` does not fire `Exited` event on Windows #63328
  • Socket ReceiveAsync method has bug when receiving multicast packets #63327
  • Test failure baseservices\\exceptions\\stackoverflow\\stackoverflowtester\\stackoverflowtester.cmd #63325
  • Test failure Loader/classloader/generics/Layout/General/class02_seq_ser/class02_seq_ser.sh #63324
  • Test failure file_io.GetSystemTimeAsFileTime.test1 #63322
  • remoteCertificate passed to LocalCertificateSelectionCallback is always null on Windows #63321
    Future

Closed

  • TcpClient.GetStream() sample code is incorrect and confusing #63154
  • surapolservice #63161
  • Suspicious fragments found by PVS-Studio Static Analyzer #30599
    Future
  • SIGSEGV crash at x64 linux alpine-net6 docker in NetSecurityNative_ImportPrincipalName #60906
    7.0.0
  • Extend Vector64<T>, Vector128<T>, and Vector256<T> to support nint and nuint #52017
    7.0.0
  • Get unknown output("Bytes to key ******") via journalctl #63206
    Future
  • Calling IHostApplicationLifetime.StopApplication() does not stop a service when configured using IHostBuilder.UseWindowsService() #63303
  • Suspicious fragments found by PVS-Studio Static Analyzer #63149
  • WindowsIdentity.RunImpersonatedAsync sending wrong credentials #63136
    7.0.0
  • .NET 6 TrimMode CopyUsed isn't working like .NET 5? #63290
  • Rename System.Drawing.Common #63330
  • Cleanup items for System.Drawing.Common #22129
    Future
  • Expose cross-platform helpers for Vector64, Vector128, and Vector256 #49397
    7.0.0
  • An exception that "Could not find or load a specific file." is thrown when different versions of dependencies are loaded in the same domain. #63213
  • jit/intrinsics/createspan_il/createspan_il.sh #62285
    7.0.0
  • System.Runtime.Intrinsics.Arm.Sha256 APIs are unavailable on Apple Silicon #62832

PullRequests

Created

  • [RateLimiting] Dequeue items when queuing with NewestFirst #63377
    area-System.Threading
  • [wasm][debugger][tests] fix filter arg for helix #63373
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix LazyMemberInfo.Equals to return false for null #63372
    area-System.ComponentModel
  • Delete dead null check in XmlQueryRuntime.DocOrderDistinct #63371
    area-System.Xml
  • Fix null ref for null Stream input in Icon.Save #63369
    area-System.Drawing
  • Remove unnecessary field writes in MimePart.SetContent #63368
    area-System.Net
  • Delete duplicated consts in XmlUTF8TextReader #63367
    area-Serialization
  • Fix index in XmlQueryRuntime.MatchesXmlType #63366
    area-System.Xml
  • [mono] Add back HAVE_SYS_ZLIB support #63365
    area-Build-mono
  • Change XmlAttributeCache.WriteValue(string) to assert #63364
    area-System.Xml
  • Remove dead code in OdbcCommandBuilder.UnquoteIdentifier #63363
    area-System.Data
  • Move HttpRequestStream.{Begin}Read argument logging to after validation #63362
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Delete a dead null check in TransactionStateDelegatedBase.EnterState #63361
    area-System.Transactions
  • [release/6.0-maui] Add back HAVE_SYS_ZLIB support #63359
    area-Build-mono
  • Implement `IEquatable<T>` on the runtime handle types. #63358
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Mitigate #60154 #63357
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Don't cache commandline in coreclr diagnostics server #63356
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Update `dotnet6` to `dotnet7` NuGet feeds, bump Intellisensense package version to latest in `dotnet7-transport` #63352
  • Fix bug where we reference the entry #0 in the pinned plug queue (#60966) #63351
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add CentOS Stream 9 to the helix matrix #63347
    community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] WinHttp: always read HTTP/2 streams to the end #63346
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.2
  • Fix debug-only tracing in PhysicalMemoryMonitor.SetLimit #63342
    area-System.Runtime.Caching
  • Remove some unnecessary duplicated checks #63341
    area-Meta
  • Enable IDE0059 analyzer: Unnecessary assignment of a value #63340
    area-Meta
  • [wasm][debugger] Sort properties by protection level in structures. #63339
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Update runtime.json with manjaro information #63338
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Webpack & NextJS samples #63335
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • Fix running WASM tests locally on Windows #63334
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • Convert SAL1 to SAL2 #63333
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove dependency of type system tests on ILCompiler.ReadyToRun #63323
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Implement System.Runtime.CompilerServices.DisabledRuntimeMarshallingAttribute on CoreCLR-family of runtimes/type systems #63320
    area-Interop-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0

Merged

  • Update Codespaces instructions for latest #63376
    area-Meta
  • [release/6.0] Fix build with Clang 13 #63314
    Servicing-approved, area-Meta, 6.0.2
  • make sure OpenSSL is initialized before Tls13Supported code runs #62973
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux
  • Bump SdkBandVersion prop to 6.0.200 #62787
    area-Infrastructure
  • Pass configuration as a parameter for local Apple mobile test runs #63348
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • clean up header collection property implementations #63308
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Add comment about using source-generated p/invokes to interop guidelines #63350
    documentation, area-Interop-coreclr
  • Enable support for nint/nuint for Vector64/128/256<T> #63329
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Disable console test for jitstressreg mode #63349
    area-System.Console
  • Accelerate additional cross platform hardware intrinsics #61649
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix order of line number/position arguments to XsltException ctor #63344
    area-System.Xml
  • Fix Instrument.ts_tags to be static in .NET Framework build #63343
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 7.0.0
  • Logging in console test to help understand #60240 #63326
    area-System.Console
  • [release/6.0-maui] transform sgen_get_descriptor to parallel safe version in job_major_mod_union_preclean #63296
    area-GC-mono
  • Divide properties into: public, private, protected. #62627
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [DllImportGenerator] Update buffer size field for custom marshalling #63316
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Fix GetSpanDataFrom #63306
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add some diagnostics for EFS tests #63243
    area-System.IO
  • Revert SafeBuffer change around pointer initialization #63289
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • A few minor tweaks to Regex source generator rendering #63276
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Extend case optimization in MatchCharacterClass to all chars that differ by one bit #63275
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance
  • Extend CPU capabilities detection for osx-arm64 (#62832) #62958
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Robustify a name resolution test #63259
    area-System.Net
  • Delete ILCompiler.TypeSystem.ReadyToRun project #63313
    area-crossgen2-coreclr

Updated

  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.FileExtensions` #57434
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • First try at implementing newly suggested ctor for providing tighter control over charset #63231
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • add capture group name in comment #63255
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-maui' #63112
    area-Meta
  • 'cmeq' Vector64<T>.Zero/Vector128<T>.Zero ARM64 containment optimizations #62933
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use generic collections in System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter implementation #63315
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • [DRAFT][Perf][Mono] Enable llvm for arm perf runs #63311
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix non-portable coreclr arm64 build #63121
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1535596 #62663
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Port Mono to Raspberry Pi, ship as new linux-armv6 RID #62594
    area-Infrastructure-mono, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [Draft][Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure
  • Reduce the memory footprint of HttpHeaders #62981
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Make some icalls pass/return object references using ObjectHandleOnStack/QCallTypeHandle #62141
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/6.0] Undo breaking change in 6.0 in environment variable configuration prefix support #62916
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Making user secrets optional by default #62917
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration, 6.0.2
  • Ensure the JIT view of InstructionSets is correct in the face of JitConfig switches #62420
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • HostBuilder.Build doc: mention lifetime #63123
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Explicit test for injecting scoped IServiceProvider into scoped and transient services (#63225) #63226
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] bump sourcebuild leg timeout #63298
    area-Infrastructure
  • [6.0] Fix named mutexes on OSX to work between arm64 and emulated x64 processes #62765
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, 6.0.2
  • [release/6.0] Fix setting timestamp on Windows on readonly files #62922
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO, 6.0.2
  • [wasm][debugger] Missing test files #63148
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono, 6.0.2
  • [release/6.0] Unify the FlushProcessWriteBuffers mechanism for macOS arm64 / x64 #63301
    Servicing-approved, area-PAL-coreclr, 6.0.2
  • [release/6.0] Update COM host to match RegAsm registration behavior #63318
    Servicing-rejected, area-Host, 6.0.x
  • [LoongArch64] add coreclr-libraries directory. #62888
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • LoggingHttpMessageHandler should log unescaped URL in log message (#62894) #63012
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, community-contribution
  • Arm64: Memory barrier improvements #62895
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr/debug and part of inc directory. #62886
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • BackgroundService doc: improve API documentation #63011
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Refactor optimizing morph for commutative operations #63251
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Replace name with type and codepage in EncodingConversionOverflow exception #62910
    area-System.Text.Encoding
  • Initial changes for emscripten 2.0.34 #62499
    area-Build-mono
  • Remove unused private parameters in SPC #63015
    area-System.Runtime
  • Faster IndexOf for substrings #63285
    area-System.Memory
  • [Android] Fix accessing network interfaces information #62780
    area-System.Net, os-android
  • Convert JIT/Methodical/Array/range Pri0 tests and hook up mobile testing #62752
    area-Infrastructure
  • [DRAFT][wasm] Switch default modules to es6 #62740
    NO REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • File.CopyTo: try to pre-allocate disk space for large destination files #61676
    area-System.IO, os-linux, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Fix JsonObject constuctor #63150
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • StreamReader sync/async optimizations: ArrayPool, IndexOfAny, ValueStringBuilder #62552
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • 62606 Return fully qualified path from FileSystemEventArgs #63051
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Support Single-file executable in Windows 7 #63196
    area-Single-File, community-contribution
  • Add RegexGenerator to System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter. #62325
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • fix LocalCertificateSelectionCallback on unix #63200
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, os-mac-os-x
  • Add alignment to mapped field stream #63305
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • Added DrawRectangle overload accepting RectangleF #62385
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution

entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • aspcore-corert-ado-pg TechEmpower Benchmark does not compile on mac #1799

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `TargetOutputs` is empty after building another project with `MSBuild` task #23252
  • `dotnet test` string-backed, flag-style parameters require arguments incorrectly #23250
    Backlog
  • Properties and items aren't logged at evaluation for `dotnet build` #23248

Closed

  • Can't debug dotnet pack code from VS #23101
    Discussion
  • Question: Is a M1 Mac required to build Mac-arm64 App? #23195

PullRequests

Created

  • Marcpop msft tryinstallingworkload #23251
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Opt into IEventSource4 #23249
    Area-NetSDK
  • Update to RTM SDK release #23247
    Area-AspNetCore
  • reenable test #23236
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • cherry-pick "include props and targets for code style packages" #23211
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Update .vsts-ci.yml #23022
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1.4xx #23060
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0.2xx #23059
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-04
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • return RenderFragment from outside razor files #5605

Updated

  • Can't use C# 8.0 using declaration with a discard #2235
    Backlog
  • [Proposal]: Avoid synthesizing parameterless struct constructors #5552
  • [Proposal]: `NotNullWhenMember` attribute #5600
  • Championed: Non-defaultable value types #146

PullRequests

Merged

  • Update the required members spec #5566

Updated

  • Low level struct updates #5602

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Adding editorconfig then re-opening results in massively edited editorconfig #58616
    17.1
  • Adding editorconfig via Add Item menu shows error #58615
    17.1
  • GUI Editor for editorconfig files doesn't work. #58614
    17.1
  • editorconfig editor window does not show correct file Location #58613
    17.2
  • InvalidOperationException: WaitAndGetResult cannot be called from a thread pool thread #58612
    17.1
  • Adding an editorconfig throws exception #58611
    17.2
  • .editorconfig File Editor Has Issue if No .cs Files Exist #58610
    17.2
  • C# Code Style Options (general) are not correctly saved #58609
    17.2
  • VS 2022 : saving 'Code Style' option is not correct #58608
    17.2
  • View.Modified desynch editing .editorconfig #58607
    17.2
  • NullReferenceException in AbstractRemoveUnusedValuesCodeFixProvider #58606
    17.2
  • F7 (switch to text-view) not working in .editor Config Editor in VIsual Studio 2022 #58605
    17.2
  • Null array constant in metadata causes overflow in attribute decoding #58598
  • Possible bug for `ParameterSyntax.Update` API around `exclamationExclamationToken` behavior #58597
  • Add codefix for `ERR_StructHasInitializersAndNoDeclaredConstructor` (CS8983) #58593
    17.2
  • Wrong, Unclear and not helpful WorkspaceDiagnostic errors reported for .csproj projects based on versions below .NET 5.0 #58592
    17.2
  • Using CompletionService.GetDescriptionAsync there are a lot of xmlExceptions #58589
    17.2
  • Invalid null-checked parameter syntax doesn't cause errors. #58585
    17.1

Closed

  • Member access inside object creation inserts unwanted parentheses #58574
    17.1
  • Code fix to move a type to another file also migrates the `#nullable X` directive, removing it from the original file #58533
  • VS 2017 RC - move type to file bug #32428
    Backlog
  • "Move type to file" can bring along #endregion directive, resulting in non-compiling code #57077
    Backlog
  • NullableWalker: operator inference shouldn't infer from target typed conditional expresion #58369
    17.1
  • Target-typed new expressions don't update their types with nullability #49736
    17.1
  • Allow non-fatal error reports to include FaultSeverity #57699
    17.1
  • Source generators cannot use a hint name with valid metadata naming convention characters #58476
    Compiler.Next
  • Null-forgiving operator (!) does not work if it is used before an actual warning #58603
  • confusion over whether string is nullable #57974
  • Stack overflow through type forwarder #58517
    17.1
  • [Proposal] Compiler generated `IEnumerator` implementations should be `struct` sometimes #57903
  • Roslyn emits unnecessary conv.u opcodes over transient pointers #57970
  • why can't the source generator be used in the net6.0? #57990
  • Source generators don't work with visual studio 2022 #58000
  • Compiler is not picking up the extension method defined. #58001
  • "Unused private member" fires on private constants that are used by attributes #48109
    Backlog
  • Missing items in Task List #50084
    Backlog
  • Preprocessor Directives in .csproj files get rejected when they contain line breaks or white space. #58391
  • Lambdas + custom delegate types + type inference = breaking change in C# 10 #57916
  • 'is' operator reports seemingly wrong results for interface over enum array #58378

PullRequests

Created

  • Make TryNavigateToMetadataSymbol asynchronous #58617
    Area-IDE
  • Correctly handle null array constants from source and metadata #58604
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58601
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Remove FileTextLoaderOptions #58596
    Area-IDE
  • Handle globalconfig files correctly in configuration code actions #58591
    Area-IDE, 17.1
  • Fix MemoryExtensions.TrimStart #58587
    Area-Compilers, 17.1
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #58584
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Fix NRE in CompletionListUpdater #58602
    Area-IDE, 17.1.P3
  • Simplify WorkCoordinator #58595
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Refactor IsAutoPropertyWithGetAccessor usage in MethodCompiler #58515
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • use pair-wise testing on PR validation #57657
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Adjust design behind Nullable analysis for target-typed expressions and add handling for target-typed new. #58509
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, New Language Feature - Target-Typed New, Next
  • Allow valid metadata name characters in source generator hint names #58506
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Simplify how our FatalError type works and introduce a severity concept #58094
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, UX Review Not Required, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #58600
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #58599
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58594
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Exclude service config files for .Net 6 host from ServiceHub folder #58580
    Area-IDE, Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Fix setting InBreakState flag #58436
    Area-Interactive, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #58582
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix incremental build failures #58429
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Break binding cycles caused by type forwarders. #58535
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • CodeFixContext cleanup #58565
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove CS1574 suppression #50365
    Area-Interactive, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58590
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fix branch URLs in Language Feature Status #58011
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58586
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58583
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #58618
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Avoid race condition in map for TupleElementIndex #58500
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Tuples
  • Parameter null-checking analyzer and fixer #58182
    Area-Analyzers
  • Do not synthesize a parameterless constructor for struct types; report error if struct has field initializers but no constructors #58581
    Area-Compilers
  • Use interpolated string handler for Contract.ThrowIf methods #58173
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Support live diagnostics in source generated files #58363
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Simplify fault reporting #58367
    Area-IDE
  • SourceLink quality of life improvements #58209
    Area-IDE
  • API for getting a deterministic key for a Compilation #57134
    Area-Compilers
  • Null annotate ISymbol.ContainingSymbol #58340
    Area-Compilers
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1535636 #58384
    auto-merge
  • Rename options refactoring #58403
    Area-IDE
  • Fix Integration test MetadataReference #58204
    Area-IDE
  • Make IOperation.ChildOperations public #52923
    Area-Compilers
  • Synthesize delegate types for lambdas with parameter types or return type that are not valid type arguments #57295
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements
  • List patterns: Slice value is assumed to be never null #57457
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Feature - List Patterns
  • don't include implicit/explicit keywords when completing explicit interface operator #53938
    Area-IDE, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Report AdditionalLocations for CS8618 (uninitialized non-nullable member) #58096
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Extend TypeDeclarationStructureTests with records #48161
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Initial implementation of event hookup in object initializers. #56322
    Area-Compilers, 17.2
  • Avoid duplicate syntax node callbacks for record declarations #58482
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, 17.1
  • SignatureHelp: guess best overload for incomplete invocations #31843
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Backlog
  • Add a tagger that draws a line to indicate the indentation level of a raw string literal. #58518
    Area-IDE
  • Cleanup Renamer.RenameDocumentAction API #58508
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET 6 - Angular: ng serve not running until requesting page #39314
  • Publish asp.net 6 website: 'enable ready to run compilation' breaks unicode support - app won't start at all #39313
    6.0.x
  • Error retrieving the current token in a Blazor application after successful authentication in Azure B2C with Msal #39311
  • Response caching does not cache headers modified in OnStarting handler #39310
  • Receiving [Browserslist] Could not parse <ProjectDirectory>/ClientApp/package.json when using ASP.NET+React.js template #39309
  • Blazor compiling error in generated file #39308
    Backlog
  • Repeatedly reloading of .NET 6 Blazor wasm page in Firefox causes out of memory #39305
  • Injecting IAccessTokenProvider failing when using custom AuthenticationStateProvider - Blazor Wasm #39304
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Blazor Web Assembly - Debugger crashes on VS 2022 after OIDC redirect #39301
    Backlog
  • Allow response caching cache to log #39300
  • Static RenderFragment #39298
    Backlog
  • Skipped test WasmPublishIntegrationTest.Publish_HostedApp_WithoutTrimming_Works #39289
    .NET 7 Planning

Closed

  • OperationCanceledException not re-throw in SystemTextJsonOutputFormatter.WriteResponseBodyAsync with selectedEncoding is utf-8 #38633
    7.0-preview1
  • Runtime dependencies are out of date #39294
  • Very high memory consumption in Blazor app #39156
    Discussions
  • API Analyzer doesn't recognize ControllerBase.ValidationProblem. #6061
    .NET 7 Planning
  • can't use @onchange inside RenderFragment, bind works #39288
  • AddRazorPages() on new ServiceCollection > ApplicationPartManager missing parts #10611
    .NET 7 Planning
  • [.NET 6.0] server serve static file without specify any charset in the Content-Type Response Header #39169
  • Make REST API a hosted service explicitly #39215
  • Docker Compose The path must be absolute #39286
  • Unable to get library fully installed #39292
  • Consider updating DataAnnotationsMetadataProvider to use NullabilityInfoContext #38774
    .NET 7 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/5.0] Don't exclude System.IO.Pipelines from TargetingPack version check #39303
    area-infrastructure, 5.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Don't exclude System.IO.Pipelines from TargetingPack version check #39302
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Work around dotnet/msbuild#3274 #39293
    Servicing-approved, area-commandlinetools, 6.0.x
  • Do not attempt `Publish test results` when skipping tests #39291
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x
  • Backport Java test fixes #39290
    area-signalr, tell-mode, 6.0.x

Merged

  • Only ignore OCE from RequestAborted #39306
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview1
  • Reimplement the concurrency limiter middleware to use the new abstractions & implementations #39040
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Support DefaultStatusCode annotation on methods #39255
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Use full suffixed version for DepProviderKey in installers #39035
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.2
  • Don't exclude System.IO.Pipelines from TargetingPack version check #39287
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Use NullabilityInfoContext in DataAnnotationsMetadataProvider #39219
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/3.1] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `bb92160` to `6b74da4` #39259
    area-infrastructure, 3.1.x

Updated

  • Blazor RemoteJSRuntime Use SignalR Hub Options before Global Options #38947
    area-blazor
  • [WIP] ANCM: Build ARM64 in main windows build job #38997
    area-runtime
  • feat (FeatureCollection): Add `IFeatureCollection.GetRequiredFeature` extension method #39192
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Upgrade Playwright #38414
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • Fix RedisCache update that breaks usage against older redis servers #38927
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.2
  • Adding EntryAssembly to AddRazorPages/AddControllers* #39085
    area-mvc
  • [release/6.0] Stop enforcing JSON read till end if `EndInvokeJS` returns early #39075
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 6.0.2
  • [wasm] dotnet.js modularization #38721
    area-blazor, .NET 7.0
  • feat (VSCode) : Add tasks to build current project #39221
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Use JSON Property Name attributes when creating ModelState Validation errors #39008
    area-mvc
  • Update Mvc to use LoggerMessageAttribute #38658
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Fix some fast up to date check issues in VS #32140
    area-infrastructure, retrospective-action

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • UIWindow is not registered in the services for the MauiContext #3952
  • IBorder was implemented incorrectly #3951
  • StartTimer - remove #3950
  • GetNativeSize - Gets renderer or handler and calls getdesired size - remove #3949
  • GetNamedSize - remove #3948
  • GetNamedColor - remove #3947
  • Invalidate/PlatformInvalidator - try to remove #3946
  • RuntimePlatform - obsolete - make it use essentials #3945
  • Idiom/SetIdiom()/SetTargetIdiom() - obsolete - make it use essentials #3944
  • Device.FlowDirection/SetFlowDirection() - move to window #3943
  • Button.IsPressed #3942
  • Progress.ProgressTo() #3941
  • ScrollView.ScrollOrientation #3940
  • Investigate TODO detection options #3939
  • Do we want to keep the concept of NamedSize Fonts at the MAUI Core level? If so, do we want to make any design changes (allowing custom values, etc.) #3938
  • For MAUI Core, should we change TimePicker.Format and DatePicker.Format to DisplayFormatString? To make it more clear what those properties affect? #3937
  • Inline docs requirements #3936
  • Define how a new MAUI app replaces App.XAML for loading resource dictionaries #3935
  • RelativeLayout #3934
  • Move Maps to handler architecture #3933
  • SwipeView Handlers #3932
  • Navigation.PushAsync(); on windows platform throws exception: Catastrophic failure (0x8000FFFF (E_UNEXPECTED)) with same page instance #3931
  • Need recipe file #3928
  • No Valid iOS code signing keys found in keychain. Please enable Automatic Provisioning from the iOS Bundle Signing page #3927
  • Build Windows target using `dotnet build` instead of `msbuild.exe` #3926
  • Build whole Maui app (including Windows) on any OS #3925
  • The SDK demands installation of android workloads even when project doesn't target android #3924
  • VS complains about missing `android` workload even after resolving it at the command line #3923
  • Creating first maui app floods the error list, only to remove most of them later #3922

Closed

  • [Enhancement] Hit Testing API for Element selection #1846
    6.0.200-preview.11
  • App crashes with `No service for type 'Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Hosting.EffectsFactory' has been registered.` #3898
  • Use AppleMaps for iOS Maps #3918

PullRequests

Created

  • Put BoundsConverter on accessor in AbsoluteLayout #3930

Updated

  • Add FormattedText property support to Label in Controls #3637
    area/controls 🎮
  • Account for spacing when determining available space for star rows/columns #3871
    6.0.200-preview.13
  • Ensure that changing RowSpacing/ColumnSpacing invalidates grid #3873
    6.0.200-preview.13
  • [WinUI] Allow Hot Reload In-App Selector to work with WindowOverlay #3914
    partner/ui-tools
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #3765
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Guideline for Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Relational.Specification.Tests #27107
  • EF Core 3.1- Parameter does not follow the model definition used for the entity property #27106
  • EF 6.0.0 and 6.0.1: sub-lists are no longer loaded #27105
  • Support `Sum()` for `TimeSpan.Ticks` #27103

Closed

  • Azure Functions v4 "No migrations were applied. The database is already up to date." #27081
  • Deployment is copying the wrong DLL version? #27049
  • Build models with conventions in MigrationsTestBase #20157
    MQ
  • Migrations: Test using snapshot #11193
    MQ
  • How to Unit-Test provider specific functions #27085
  • Exception thrown when grouping by DATEPART #27078
  • Is it possible to disable optimistic concurrency checks temporarily? #27070
  • EF Core 3.1 - Allow mapping of multiple entities using stored procedure #27068
  • Migrate does not create initial database with tables #26889
  • Exception when creating new migration after updating from 6.0-rc.1 to 6.0-rc.2 or 6.0-rtm (daily) #26405
    6.0.2
  • efcore6 produces wrong SELECT SQL when Where/OrderBy clauses are applied to Owned properties followed by .Take() #26592
    6.0.2
  • Self-referencing entity circular dependency happening just on EF Core 6.0 #26750
    6.0.2
  • Many To Many Exception when adding and removing same entity #26779
    6.0.2
  • EntityFrameworkCore6.0.0 memory footprint is very high #27104
  • Add Property/Reference/etc overloads that take IProperty/INavigation #7390
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • Use conventions and model snapshot in the migration tests #27031
  • Grinding the gears of war #27055
  • Christmas crackers: Add Property/Reference/etc overloads that take IProperty/INavigation #27058

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Add [DynamicDependency] on System.Math for trimming #27098
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.2
  • [release/6.0] Put parentheses around IS NULL for non-bool operands #26653
  • There's no escape from those cold north winds #27050
